title: kandanadu pAdAravindamE shatam
sahitya:
kandanadu pAdAravindamE shatam enru karudi varuvOr gati peruvAr urudiyAi


anupallavi

  cendUr shenravan sannidhiyil ninru cintaiyOr siridum sidarAmal kuvindu


caraNam    bandha pAsha vinaiyin piDippilaghappaTTu nondu nalindiDuvOr nADi vandu paNindAl
enda tollaiyum ini enrum avar urAmal cintai kanindu krpai sheidaruL puriyum
